data.name: Growing Up Demo
data.detailed_description:
In this demo, you can experience the Baby Stage, Preschool, and the beginning of Elementary School.
If you like the demo, please add Growing Up to wishlist, many thanks!

Please note that the savedata of the demo cannot be used in the final game.

In this game you are born into an average family in the 90s USA.

Over the first 18 years of your life you will witness your character grow and change. You will make decisions about what skills you want to learn and what activities you want to do. Develop your mind, manage your daily schedule, visit different parts of the city, form friendships, study for tests, and take exams. Once you reach adulthood you will discover what career awaits you and who you married! As you start a new family, your child will be born… and the cycle will begin anew!

Play another life as the offspring, make different decisions and see how things play out this time. Keep extending the family line for multiple generations!
